title: Add a Mortgagee Clause to a Home Policy
description: A customer has refinanced their home and needs to update the mortgagee (lender) listed on their homeowner's policy.

tasks.description: Collect the new lender's name and address for the mortgagee clause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the new lender's information.

tasks.description: Update the mortgagee clause on the policy and send proof of insurance to the new lender.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the policy and sends the required documents to the lender.
